title: PROSOFT Hear v1.3.0.2147
description:
PROSOFT Hear v1.3.0.2147

Make your Computer Sound Amazing

Hear is sound enhancement software for your computer, which greatly improves the sound quality from your headphones, internal or external speakers. Hear can add 3D sound and other various special effects as well as independent volume control for the open applications on your Mac or PC.

Features
Hear offers a wide array of settings that are quick easy to find and will greatly improve the sound quality of your music, movies and games.

GENERAL
Adjust the general settings (bass, dewoofer, fidelity) and enable various effects

EQUALIZER
Features the most advanced N-band equalizer with built-in peak limiters. You can choose between slider or curve mode for fine-adjustments

MIXER
Allows you to adjust the sound volume for various applications, so you donâ€™t have a loud mail sound while you are listening to music

3D
Expanding audio environment out of actual speaker positions

AMBIENCE
Allows you to add reverb effect to the output

FX
Is an aggressive type of surround sound remixing

MAXIMIZER
Bring your concert home...produces a more â€œliveâ€ feature to the music (bass is boomier and highs are crisper)

BW
Meditate to your music...itâ€™s a special feature that can help you relax after work, it does so by generating brain waves targeted at relaxation

LIMITER
Ceiling and threshold, control aspects of level compression

SPACE
Creates a virtual re-sounding frame behind the listenerâ€™s position and bounces the sound around

FIDELITY
Restores the subtle nuances that are often damaged in the recording process

SPEAKER
Widen the frequency range of your speaker system (or headphones) and corrects output phase

SUB
Expands bass frequencies like a real subwoofer does
